org.kaaproject.kaa.server.common.dao

Interface SdkProfileService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SdkProfileServiceImpl

    public interface SdkProfileService
    The interface for SdkProfile service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.admin.SdkProfileDto saveSdkProfile(org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.admin.SdkProfileDto sdkPropertiesDto)
      Save sdk properties.

    • Method Detail

      • saveSdkProfile

        org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.admin.SdkProfileDto saveSdkProfile(org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.admin.SdkProfileDto sdkPropertiesDto)
        Save sdk properties. If sdk properties object has id, then sdk key will be updated, otherwise if there is no other sdk key object with the same token, it will be inserted as a new sdk key object, if there is, nothing will be saved, existent object will be returned
        Parameters:
        sdkPropertiesDto - the sdk properties dto
        Returns:
        the saved application dto object

      • findSdkProfileById

        org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.admin.SdkProfileDto findSdkProfileById(String id)
        Returns an SDK profile by its identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - An SDK profile identifier
        Returns:
        An SDK profile with the given identifier

      • findSdkProfileByToken

        org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.admin.SdkProfileDto findSdkProfileByToken(String token)
        Returns an SDK profile by its token.
        Parameters:
        token - An SDK profile token
        Returns:
        An SDK profile with the given token

      • findSdkProfilesByApplicationId

        List<org.kaaproject.kaa.common.dto.admin.SdkProfileDto> findSdkProfilesByApplicationId(String applicationId)
        Returns a list of SDK profiles for an application with the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - An application identifier
        Returns:
        A list of SDK profiles for an application with the given identifier

      • removeSdkProfileById

        void removeSdkProfileById(String id)
        Removes an SDK profile from the database by its identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the SDK profile to remove

      • isSdkProfileUsed

        boolean isSdkProfileUsed(String token)
        Checks whether an SDK profile is used by at least one endpoint.
        Parameters:
        token - The token of the SDK profile to check
        Returns:
        true if the SDK profile is used, false otherwise
